content: I'm glad you mentioned hut bookings, that's something I'll definitely need to plan ahead for. Speaking of planning ahead, I've been doing a lot of hiking recently, including my solo trip to Yosemite where I hiked to the top of Vernal Falls on the first day, and I've learned that it's essential to have the right gear and clothing. Do you have any recommendations for must-have items to pack for my New Zealand trip, especially for the multi-day hikes?
